verses.verse: The <S%H4397>angel<s%> who <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me came <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H5782>wakened<s%> <S%H376>me,<s%> as a man who is <S%H5782>wakened<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>me,<s%> "What do you see?" I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> and <S%H4501>behold,<s%> a lampstand all of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with its <S%H1531>bowl<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H7651>it,<s%> and its seven <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H7651>thereon;<s%> there are seven <S%H4166>pipes<s%> to each of <S%H7651>the<s%> <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> which are on the top of <S%H7218>it;<s%>
and <S%H8147>two<s%> olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> by <S%H259>it,<s%> one on the <S%H3225>right<s%> side of the <S%H1543>bowl,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> on the left side of <S%H8040>it.<s%>"
I <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, "What are <S%H113>these,<s%> my lord?"
Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3045>me,<s%> "Don't you know what these <S%H559>are?<s%>" I said, <S%H113>"No,<s%> my lord."

Then he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, "This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2428><s%> 'Not by might, nor by <S%H3581>power,<s%> but by my <S%H7307>Spirit,<s%>' <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

Who are <S%H1419>you,<s%> great <S%H2022>mountain?<s%> <S%H6440>Before<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> you are a <S%H4334>plain;<s%> and he will bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H68>capstone<s%> with shouts <S%H2580>of<s%> 'Grace, <S%H2580>grace,<s%> to it!'"
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

"The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> have laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of this <S%H1004>house.<s%> His <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall also <S%H1214>finish<s%> <S%H3045>it;<s%> and you will know that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has sent me to <S%H7971>you.<s%>

<S%H936>Indeed,<s%> who despises the <S%H3117>day<s%> of small <S%H6996>things?<s%> For these seven shall <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> and shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H68>plumb<s%> line in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel.<s%> <S%H7651>These<s%> are the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which run back and <S%H7751>forth<s%> through the whole <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
Then I <S%H559>asked<s%> <S%H8147>him,<s%> "What are these two olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> on the <S%H3225>right<s%> side of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> and on the left side of <S%H8040>it?<s%>"

I <S%H559>asked<s%> him the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8147>time,<s%> "What are these two <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H7641>branches,<s%> which are <S%H3027>beside<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6804>spouts,<s%> that <S%H7324>pour<s%> the golden oil out of <S%H2091>themselves?<s%>"
He <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H3045>me,<s%> "Don't you know what these <S%H559>are?<s%>" I said, <S%H113>"No,<s%> my lord."
Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> "These are the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3323>anointed<s%> <S%H1121>ones<s%> who <S%H5975>stand<s%> by the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
